messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: These are some of the issues that blight the lives of some Arleston residents. Only a Conservative government has the necessary leadership to take action: - Conservatives will cut immigration by putting a limit on the number of new people coming into the country. - Conservatives will set up a new National Citizen Service to give young people something to do at night and to tackle boredom. - Conservatives will give local people more powers to deal with noisy neighbours and disruptive residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives will cut immigration by putting a limit on the number of new people coming into the country.
Conservatives will set up a new National Citizen Service to give young people something to do at night and to tackle boredom.
Conservatives will give local people more powers to deal with noisy neighbours and disruptive residents.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you want to make your quality of life better - then on Thursday 6th May â€“ VOTE CONSERVATIVE - VOTE MARK PRITCHARD

images.caption: Mark Pritchard Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for The Wrekin

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. I believe everyone should be free to talk about immigration openly - without being called a "bigot"
